ygData.subject: Re: New To EQ and have a problem.
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t you have to be a member of the guild to partake in the bigger quests down the line though?  I would definitely suggest restarting so you can be a member
ygData.messageBody:
Don't you have to be a member of the guild to partake in the bigger quests
down the line though? I would definitely suggest restarting so you can be a
member of the guild...it's hard enough being a necro without being in a
guild as well. :)

----- Original Message -----
From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 4:19 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] New To EQ and have a problem.


> From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
>
> you dont really miss out on much, just a tiny bit of experience (and the
> robe, of course). the ac isnt that hot anyway, tho. to be honest with
you,
> i would either
> a. create a new character. this is good if you havent invested much time
> into your first one, or
> b. dont worry about it. since the reward isnt that great after all. i was
> in much the same situation in the beta test, so i did it right in the
final
> release, so i know it isnt much. and i did end up with a body i couldnt
> recover, so no robe twice =) but you can buy one later anyway. the color
> also made my body harder to find.
>
> my 2cp
>
> belphenor
>
>
> >From: shaithis <shaithis@...>
> >
> >Hello all,
> >
> >I'd just like to say I finally bought EQ after everyone at my work,
> >and all my friends have made me sick about raving about it. Well, I'm
> >in a little bit of a bind.
> >
> >I just started out and died when I finally reached my Guild house.
> >Unfortunately I couldn't get my corpse and have lost my note I was
> >supposed to hand to the necromancer there. I hear from my friends
> >that I should get a robe or something, but I don't have the note. Is
> >there any way to get a new note or something? None of the stores
> >nearby will sell me anything because I'm a necromancer, so I'd like to
> >get this one. Also is there anything else I am missing out on by
> >not completing this quest? I mean, I'm sure I can eventually find a
> >robe somewhere, I just don't want to miss out on a bunch of stuff.
> >
> >Thanx
> >===
> > ,,
> >Shaithis
> > ,,
> >
> >
